org.apache.uima.collection.metadata
Interface CasProcessorRunInSeperateProcess

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, MetaDataObject, Serializable, XMLizable
public interface CasProcessorRunInSeperateProcess
extends MetaDataObject

An object that holds configuration that is part of the CPE descriptor. It provides the means of configuring executable program used by the CPE when launching local CasProcessor.

Method Summary
 CasProcessorExecutable getExecutable()
          Returns CasProcessorExecutable program used by the CPE to launch CasProcessor.
 void setExecutable(CasProcessorExecutable aExec)
          Sets CasProcessorExecutable executable program used by the CPE to launch CasProcessor.
